definition: definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
variant of 確|确[que4]/variant of 埆[que4]
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

pinyin: bu4 que4 ding4 xing4 yuan2 li3

sentences.english: I think he lives at No. 23 West Street, but I'm not sure about the number.
sentences.chinese: 我想他住在西大街23号，但是我对号码不确定。

sentences.english: The remaining places on the Middletons' front row are yet to be confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 剩余的座位安排尚有待确定。

sentences.english: At last, the general equation for separation of high order definite err…
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了分离多阶确定性误差的通式。

sentences.english: When finished with the list, click OK then close out of Local Group Policy Editor.
sentences.chinese: 完成列表后，点击确定并关闭本地组策略编辑器。

sentences.english: The CrossCorrelation is an essential means of getting disturbing industrial frequency.
sentences.chinese: 互相关函数是确定工频干扰噪声频率的一个重要手段。

sentences.english: Or have scientists been sexing up the risks and playing down the uncertainties?
sentences.chinese: 或者科学家对风险添油加醋，而贬低了不确定性？

sentences.english: Give me a determinate answer to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 请对该问题给我一个确定的回答。

sentences.english: Result Determin the best prescription approach and prepare the samples.
sentences.chinese: 结果确定处方最佳工艺并制备样品。

sentences.english: It aims to improve the useability of sensor uncertain data stream and gain more information from it.
sentences.chinese: 目的在于从不确定传感器数据流中获得更多有用信息。

sentences.english: This text uses the general method, have confirmed Ferranini's marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文用一般方法，确定了法尼尼家居中心的营销战略。

sentences.english: We are committed to carrying out settlement audit for construction engineering and calculating the construction cost impartially and fairly.
sentences.chinese: 对建设工程进行决算审计，公正公平地确定工程造价。

sentences.english: He suggests establishing a trial period and a date for review.
sentences.chinese: 他建议设定一段试行期，并确定一个重新评估日期。

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍卖成交价成反比的原则确定。

sentences.english: The isosteric heats of adsorption were determined from the isotherms and the factors that influence their variations were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 从等温线确定了等量吸附热并讨论了其影响因素。

sentences.english: Ttip the punctuated equilibrium of market economics in their favor.
sentences.chinese: 以自己的方式确定市场经济的准确平衡。

sentences.english: Clear glass cover allows observation of interior mechanism to aid in setting and checkout.
sentences.chinese: 透明玻璃盖允许观察内部机制，以帮助确定和检验。

definition: according to/in accordance with/in the light of/on the basis of
to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
clear/distinct/to understand thoroughly/to be clear about
to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
